scheme_name: Mukhyamantri Work From Home-Job Work Yojana
description: The Mukhyamantri Work From Home-Job Work Yojana in Rajasthan allows women to work from home and earn income through various jobs, such as handicrafts, data entry, or packaging, promoting flexible employment opportunities.

benefits.financial_assistance: Up to Rs. 50,000 for job setup
benefits.market_linkages: Access to job providers and markets

residency_criteria: Must be a resident of Rajasthan
economic_criteria: Preference for women from low-income households

eligible_activities: Work-from-home jobs like handicrafts, data entry, or packaging

steps: Visit the Rajasthan Women Empowerment Department portal
Submit an online application with job preferences
Upload required documents, including Aadhaar and residency proof
Applications are reviewed by the department
Approved candidates receive training and job assignments
application_process.note: Applicants must have basic skills for chosen jobs

special_notes: Jobs are assigned through registered agencies
Priority is given to rural women
Applicants must maintain work quality standards
